name: The White House
description: With this hands-on, minds-on craft project, you'll recreate details from the neoclassical columns of the president's Executive Residence and colonnades connecting the East and West Wings to the surrounding gardens and fountain. This LEGO Architecture White House model (21054) can be divided into 3 sections for closer inspection and includes a LEGO brick inscribed �The White House� to complete an inspiring display piece.
